org.hps.record.epics

Class EpicsHeader

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hps.record.epics.EpicsHeader

  • public final class EpicsHeader
extends Object
    Representation of EPICs header data from the EVIO bank (run, sequence, time stamp).

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private int run
      The run number.
      private int sequence
      The sequence number.
      private int timestamp
      The unix time in seconds.

    • Constructor Summary

    • Constructor Detail

      • EpicsHeader

        public EpicsHeader(int[] data)
        Class constructor.

        The data array should be length 3 and usually will come from the int data of a GenericObject. In order, it should contain the run, sequence and timestamp values.

        Parameters:
        data - the header data with length 3

    • Method Detail

      • fromEvio

        static EpicsHeader fromEvio(int[] headerBank)
        Create an EpicsHeader from an int array in the EVIO bank.

        This reads in indices 1 to 3 as 0 and 5 are unused.

        Parameters:
        headerBank - the header bank data
        Returns:
        the EpicsHeader object
